definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Most loess is considered to be an eolian deposit.
sentences.chinese: 大多數黃土被認爲是一種風成沉積。

sentences.english: Small wind sand dunes develop in the lakeshore zone.
sentences.chinese: 湖岸帶發育小型風成砂丘。

sentences.english: Wind-borne soil deposits give this area it's abundance of foliage.
sentences.chinese: 風成土壤沉積使得這個地區植被茂盛。

sentences.english: The discriminant parameter for the sedimentological environment determining, calculated by the statistical parameters of grain size, also shows the same result.
sentences.chinese: 環境判別參數也顯示泥炭灰分來源爲風成的。

sentences.english: Aeolian sedimentation is obvious in some strata, which reflects the arid sedimentary environment.
sentences.chinese: 部分層位的風成作用明顯是那個時代乾旱的標誌。

sentences.english: The surface rarely shows such features as wind ripples or wind granule ripples.
sentences.chinese: 表面上很少顯示出風成沙波紋或風成細礫波紋。

sentences.english: Aeolian process of the loess is still going on nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 黃土的風成過程目前仍在進行。
